english.segment1: It's obvious what you think about me. Cause you won't even give me a chance. I don't mind what you say about me. When you talk to your friends all the time
english.segment2: Was it something I said to you. To make you think that I was just a fool. Or maybe
english.segment3: You're too pretty. You're too pretty for me. I don't want to let you down
english.segment4: You're too pretty. You're too pretty for me. I don't want to wear that crown
english.segment5: One day you're gonna wish you'd given me a chance. When I'm standing on top of the world. And you're stuck down there in your fantasy. With all your diamonds and pearls
english.segment6: Was it something I said to you. To make you think that I was just a fool. Or maybe
english.segment7: You're too pretty. You're too pretty for me. I don't want to let you down
english.segment8: You're too pretty. You're too pretty for me. I don't want to wear that crown
english.segment9: I never got up the nerve. To say to you what I wanted to. If I had a choice you know that I would. Turn back the hands of time
